ing: 6 (12 ounce) cans pilsner-style beer, or to taste
2 quarts prepared lemonade, or to taste
des: "Radler means 'cyclist' in German, and this refreshing drink was invented in Germany in the late 19th or early 20th century as a way to refresh bicyclists worn out by the summer heat. It is a 50/50 or 60/40 mixture of beer and lemonade and is a delicious addition to the menu of your summer barbeque or party."
ins: Combine beer and lemonade in a gallon-sized pitcher.
